p: The literature research was performed on the MEDLINE ® and Cochrane database using terms individually or the Boolean ANDs and ORs. In the search strategy, the following terms were included: “pediatric obesity”, “metabolic syndrome”, “LCPUFA”, “fatty acids”, “dyslipidemia”, “insulin resistance”, “hypertension”, pregnancy”, “DHA supplementation”, “epigenetic”. All sources were retrieved between 2005 and 2019.
